response.overview: Eighteen-year-old Maty is unhappy with his life and decides to make a major change – he wants to move away from Prague and study at a university in Brno. However, his best friend Šimon is not on board with the idea of being left behind. The night before the entrance exams, Šimon drags Maty to a party in an attempt to change his mind. But as the night spirals out of control, Maty finds himself in situations that force him to rethink everything.
response.tagline: We're just going out for one.
response.title: Jako Bratr
